hackathon-description-text: BUILDATHON is the ultimate hardware hackathon. Come join us at Freeman Fabrication Grand Prairie for the experience of a lifetime!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Create new ways to design booth environments/displays using VR/AR and other technologies.
Create new ways to build, assemble, deploy booths/displays using new fab designs, tech, CAD, 3D printing.
Create new ways to reduce waste and lost productivity due to lost items and tools using IoT.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2940 114th St, Grand Prairie, TX 75050, USA
hackathon-description-header: The ultimate hardware hackathon, hosted by Freeman Fabrication Grand Prairie.
